long_description: The Seattle Sports E-Merse Original case lets you talk, text and take pictures right through the waterproof barrier. It's sized to fit smaller smartphones and many compact point-and-shoot cameras. Sealed seams, resealable inner closure and second slide-open clamp offer peace of mind. Padded rear panel helps protect contents from bumps and drops and adds flotation. The Seattle Sports E-Merse Original case is made of tough, PVC-free thermoplastic polyurethane that remains flexible in cold weather.
short_description: The Seattle Sports E-Merse Original case lets you talk, text and take pictures right through the waterproof barrier. It's sized to fit smaller smartphones and many compact point-and-shoot cameras.
